title: My Hope Is Built On Nothing Less

author.name: Edward Mote
author.bio: Edward Mote was an English Baptist minister and hymn writer, best known for the hymn 'My Hope Is Built on Nothing Less'.

lyrics:
My hope is built
On nothing less
Than Jesus' blood
And righteousness,
I dare not trust
The sweetest frame,
But wholly lean
On Jesusâ€™ name.

CHORUS:
On Christ
The solid Rock, I stand,
All other ground
Is sinking sand,
All other ground
Is sinking sand.

When darkness hides
His lovely face,
I rest on His
Unchanging grace,
In every high
And stormy gale,
My anchor holds
Within the veil.

His oath, His covenant,
His blood,
Support me in
The whelming flood;
When all around
My soul gives way,
He then is all
My hope and stay.

When He shall come
With trumpet sound,
O may I then
In Him be found,
Clothed in His
Righteousness alone,
Faultless to stand
Before the throne.
